trans-unit.source: Specifies a print controller that displays a document on a screen as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un controller di stampa che visualizza un documento sullo schermo sotto forma di una serie di immagini.

trans-unit.source: Typically, to use the print preview feature, you create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> class and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: In genere, per usare la funzionalità di anteprima di stampa, si crea un'istanza di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> e impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes, though you can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> when managing the display of your own print preview window.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> viene utilizzato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classi, sebbene sia possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> quando la gestione della visualizzazione della finestra di anteprima di stampa.

trans-unit.source: When used with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>, performs the print preview, and sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> back to the original value.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> imposta il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> dell'oggetto associato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> per un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>, esegue l'anteprima di stampa e imposta il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> il valore originale.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> che viene visualizzato durante l'anteprima di stampa.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> su un'immagine di una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> metodo la deallocazione.

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla stampa, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> panoramica dello spazio dei nomi.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController" />.

trans-unit.source: Captures the pages of a document as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce le pagine di un documento sotto forma di una serie di immagini.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo" /> that contains the pages of a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice di tipo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo" /> che contiene le pagine di un <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> sotto forma di una serie di immagini.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> image representation contained in a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo> to implement your own print preview form.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> immagine rappresentazione contenuti in un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo> per implementare il form di anteprima di stampa.

trans-unit.source: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
trans-unit.target: per la stampa protetta da una finestra di dialogo ridotta.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione associata: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this controller is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il controller viene utilizzato per l'anteprima di stampa.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> che rappresenta il documento da visualizzare in anteprima.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to preview a page in the print document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati relativi alla modalità di visualizzazione dell'anteprima di una pagina nel documento stampato.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a page in a print document.
trans-unit.target: Completa la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come visualizzare l'anteprima di una pagina in un documento stampato.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> viene chiamato immediatamente dopo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento.

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, this method is not called.
trans-unit.target: Se viene generata un'eccezione all'interno di un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento di un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, non viene chiamato questo metodo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> che viene visualizzato durante l'anteprima di stampa.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> su un'immagine di una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> metodo la deallocazione.

trans-unit.source: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
trans-unit.target: per la stampa protetta da una finestra di dialogo ridotta.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione associata: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> che rappresenta il documento da visualizzare in anteprima.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to preview the print document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati relativi alla modalità di visualizzazione dell'anteprima del documento stampato.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a print document.
trans-unit.target: Completa la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come visualizzare l'anteprima di un documento stampato.

trans-unit.source: This method is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato immediatamente dopo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> evento.

trans-unit.source: Even if an uncaught exception was thrown during the print preview process, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Anche se è stata generata un'eccezione non rilevata durante il processo di anteprima di stampa, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> che viene visualizzato durante l'anteprima di stampa.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> su un'immagine di una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> metodo la deallocazione.

trans-unit.source: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
trans-unit.target: per la stampa protetta da una finestra di dialogo ridotta.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione associata: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> che rappresenta il documento da visualizzare in anteprima.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to preview a page in the print document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati relativi alla modalità di visualizzazione dell'anteprima di una pagina nel documento stampato.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics" /> property of this parameter will be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizialmente la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics" /> di questo parametro sarà <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The value returned from this method will be used to set this property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore restituito da questo metodo sarà usato per impostare la proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a page in a print document.
trans-unit.target: Avvia la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come visualizzare l'anteprima di una pagina in un documento stampato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that represents a page from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> che rappresenta una pagina da un <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> is called immediately before <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> viene chiamato immediatamente prima <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> che viene visualizzato durante l'anteprima di stampa.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> su un'immagine di una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> metodo la deallocazione.

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing, also known as gray scaling, makes the print preview look better.
trans-unit.target: Anti-aliasing, noto anche come grigio il ridimensionamento, comportano una visualizzazione migliore di anteprima di stampa.

trans-unit.source: However, the use of anti-aliasing can slow down the rendering speed.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, l'utilizzo di anti-aliasing può rallentare la velocità di rendering.

trans-unit.source: For more information about anti-aliasing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'anti-aliasing, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
trans-unit.target: per la stampa protetta da una finestra di dialogo ridotta.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione associata: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> che rappresenta il documento da visualizzare in anteprima.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati relativi alla modalità di stampa del documento.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a print document.
trans-unit.target: Avvia la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come visualizzare l'anteprima di un documento stampato.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato immediatamente dopo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> che viene visualizzato durante l'anteprima di stampa.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> su un'immagine di una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> metodo la deallocazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> verifies that the printer settings are valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> verifica che le impostazioni della stampante siano valide.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: La stampante indicata nella proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> non esiste.

trans-unit.source: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
trans-unit.target: per la stampa protetta da una finestra di dialogo ridotta.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione associata: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use anti-aliasing when displaying the print preview.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se usare un anti alias durante la visualizzazione dell'anteprima di stampa.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the print preview uses anti-aliasing; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'anteprima di stampa utilizza un anti alias; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing, also known as gray scaling, uses several shades of gray around areas of curves and diagonals in text to give the text a smoother appearance.
trans-unit.target: Anti-aliasing, noto anche come grigio il ridimensionamento, utilizza diverse gradazioni di grigio intorno alle curve e diagonali nel testo per ottenere il testo di un aspetto più uniforme.

trans-unit.source: While using anti-aliasing makes the print preview look better, it can slow down the rendering speed.
trans-unit.target: Durante l'utilizzo di anti-aliasing consente l'anteprima di stampa migliore, può rallentare la velocità di rendering.
